sources.title: They Were so Young 1954 | Colorized Crime Movie | Scott Brady, Raymond Burr | Subtitles added!
sources.description:
Their Hearts Were So High in the Clouds...They Never Knew Their Feet Were in the Dirt!
A melodrama about young European models sent to South America to be used by crooks.

Original title: Mannequins f√ºr Rio (1954) AKA;  They Were so Young 

Original black and white version https://youtu.be/dGxdxV5zdGw

Director: Kurt Neumann
Casting: Scott Brady, Johanna Matz, Raymond Burr
Genres: Colorized Classics, Crime, Drama, Mystery, Thriller

summary:
 A Mysterious Murder on Copacabana Beach Leads to International Intrigue, Misunderstandings at a Social Gathering, Frustrations and Fears of a Model, Recounting of Events and Potential Threats, Apologies and Reports of a Missing Person, Good News for Senor Coltos, Suspicion and a Broken Ferry, Past Conversations and a Missing Girl, Accusations, Evidence, and a Plan to Escape
